name: image-to-prompt
description: Transform your images into AI-powered prompts with advanced analysis

scripts.docs: echo 'Available documentation:' && echo '• SERVICES_SETUP.md - Service integration guide' && echo '• DEPLOYMENT.md - Deployment instructions' && echo '• README.md - Project overview' && echo '• Guidelines.md - Development guidelines'
scripts.deploy-help: echo 'Quick deploy to Vercel:' && echo '1. Push to GitHub: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy" && git push' && echo '2. Visit vercel.com and import your repository' && echo '3. Your app will be live in minutes!'
scripts.check-config: node -e "console.log('🔧 Configuration Status:'); const fs = require('fs'); try { const auth = fs.readFileSync('services/auth.ts', 'utf8'); const openai = fs.readFileSync('services/openai.ts', 'utf8'); console.log('• OpenAI API:', openai.includes('YOUR_OPENAI_API_KEY_HERE') ? '❌ Not configured' : '✅ Configured'); console.log('• Google OAuth:', auth.includes('YOUR_GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID_HERE') ? '❌ Not configured' : '✅ Configured'); console.log('• Apple Sign-In:', auth.includes('YOUR_APPLE_CLIENT_ID_HERE') ? '❌ Not configured' : '✅ Configured'); console.log('\nRun npm run setup to configure services'); } catch(e) { console.log('❌ Could not check configuration'); }"
